short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A classic bingo game with some modifications. This game has some spooky characters along with numbers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a classic bingo game with halloween characters and numbers. A player has to get an entire row of numbers/pictures
or all the boxes colored to win a game. Each cell can change the color to indicate your numbers called. Happy Playing.
